Tudat(Py)¶

MGA-DSM transfers¶

Multiple Gravity Assist and Deep Space Maneuver (MGA-DSM) transfers are high thrust transfer that can be applied for interplanetary travel. These transfers are defined by a series a nodes (planets), where gravity assists (GA) are applied, connected by legs, the trajectories between the planets. Tudat(Py) provides the possibility to apply a maximum of 1 Deep Space Maneuver (DSM), i.e. a high \(\Delta V\), per leg. The MGA-DSM scripts developed for the CDL are divided in input script and 3 executables, which should be adapted and executed in order and and are explained in the referenced pages below, and a couple of source files. All these files can be downloaded from the Downloads for the Collaborative Design Lab section. However, before diving into this code, it is advised to familiarize yourself first with the content of the MGA-DSM User Guide.

  • MGA-DSM Inputs

  • MGA-DSM Optimization

  • MGA-DSM Analysis

  • MGA-DSM Save results to Excel
